Looks like we expect an IStructuredSelection but it is something else. What is 
selected at the time of the operation? I don't get this on windows so perhaps 
there is a difference in how selections are handled on GTK. Will investigate.

One of the files in the Synchronize View.  In this case, I believe it was a
"plugin.xml" file.   But, I believe I may have seen this happen on other types
of files.

Moving to M8 as I cannot reproduce this. We need to change the selection 
handling code to ensure that the selection is an IStructuredSelection.
